title: For several days every time my pixel 4xl goes to sleep I can't get it to wake. Any fixes for this?
content: It seems like if I hit the power button to lock it, the phone will be fine. However if I just set it on the table and it goes to sleep on its own then it will be like 20 min b4 I am able to get back into it. I just have a blank/black screen. even when getting a call or a text the phone will vibrate but I cant see anything to answer the call
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 4 XL
